title: Review: RockStop MTB Tire Inserts are super easy to fit, offer good rim protection
content:
After suspension, wheels are some of the most expensive real estate on your mountain bike. Keeping them round and dent-free is paramount if you want to maintain the ability to run a tubeless setup. Getting some decent rim protection is, in our opinion, always a great idea, especially on the rear wheel which tends to

The post Review: RockStop MTB Tire Inserts are super easy to fit, offer good rim protection appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
